enchantment.wom.invigoration.desc: Increase your stamina by 2 per level.
item.wom.agony.tooltip: Light and sharp spear allow his owner to perform deadly strokes. Jump attack allow to jump 2 block
skill.wom.agony_plunge.tooltip:
"Disappear in the sky before diving on your enemies."

Attacking enemies will charge this for up to 3 times.
The Final damage is multiplied by the number of charges
item.wom.tormented_mind.tooltip:
A weapon of mass murder and act of abomination.
The axe have absorbed the Wrath of its former bearer
and will transmit it into the next.
skill.wom.true_berserk.tooltip:
"May the god fear you..."

Torment wrath makes the skill gauge unreadable.
item.wom.ruine.tooltip:
An ancient weapon, forged with forgotten knowledge and infused with enderman power.
Its balance and design allow for maximum efficiency and accuracy in combat.
skill.wom.plunder_perdition.tooltip:
"Perform the enderman ritual of stealing the essence of others."

 This skill start with 1 stack and can go up to 10 stack./n/n You can allways sprint skill or jump skill but
 depending on the number of stack the skill will change./n with 2 stack, you will gain a low speed for a short duration./n With 3 stack, you will teleport on the last hitted
 target depending on your position and orientation./n With 10 stack, trigger while walking or standing will
 thrust the sword in the ground and summon blade
 on enemies around you.

 Each enemy hit will give you 5% of your max stamina and
 1 health back (+1 health per Sweeping edge level).
 Then, you will recieve overall speed boost for 10sec x (1 + (Sweeping edge level)).
The strenght of the speed depens on the number of enemy hit.
item.wom.satsujin.tooltip:
The demon is sealed inside this blade.
Strengthening the blade and increasing it's effectivness
but, as the demon is still sealed, he can't provide much more power...

Passive: Sheath your blade after 4sec of inactivity.
Sheath the blade after a shorter period
at the end of a sheathed attack.
skill.wom.sakura_state.tooltip:
"The thinnest slash performed in absolute serenity"

 On cast, you'll perform a Sakura slash in front of you. while sprinting,
 you will fastly pass through enemys in front of you, slashing them along the way.

 You can stack a total of 8 sakura slashs. Each level of sweeping edge
 on your blade will increase the number of stack by 1/3 on the initial draw.

 After the innitial draw, you'll enter sakura state.
 If you don't draw a Sakura slash again within 4 seconds, you loose all your
 stacks and get out of sakura state.
 Sakura slashes will automaticaly sheath your blade.

 Dash attack and Sakura dash slash will put 3 stack
of Perpetual slash on the enmey (+1 for each Sweeping edge lvl).
If no sheathed attack or sakura slashs is performed within 1.5s,
Land all Perpetual slashes stacked on the target, cutting it muliple times from side to side.
item.wom.ender_blaster.tooltip:
This weapon has transcended time and space
in order to find someone who can control its power at its peak.
skill.wom.ender_blast.tooltip:
"The zenith of the End world technological power."

The blaster loader is composed of 12 chambers.
Kinetic energy is stored in them and transmuted into endpower.
When the trigger is pressed, half of the converted endpower
is condensed into end bullets.
The other half is transfered into a particle accelerator that overcharges
the endpower until it blasts the bullet out with tremendous force and precision.
All of that in just a fraction of a second ... outstanding!
skill.wom.ender_fusion.tooltip:
"The zenith of the End world technological power."

Two blaster loader with 12 chambers each for 24 in Total.
the Kinetic energy stored is shared between both Blasters
and transmuted into endpower for each.
When the trigger is pressed, half of the converted endpower
is condensed into end bullets.
The other half is transfered into a particle accelerator that overcharges
the endpower until it blasts the bullet out with tremendous force and precision.
All of that in just a fraction of a second ... outstanding!
item.wom.herrscher.tooltip:
Sharp and light sword that performs very well in combat....
but... it seams to need something in order to release it's full potential.
item.wom.gesetz.tooltip:
Strong and resistent shield that block even the strongest attack....
but... it seams to need something in order to release it's full potential.
skill.wom.regierung.tooltip:
"The offensivness and defensivnes assembled in perfect harmony."

 Blocking will stack up damage depending
 on the way you block the attack.
 Some attacks have counter attack window when
 the shield is on front of the player.
item.wom.moonless.tooltip:
"What is a blade without a handle,
 a light without any shadow..
 a night without a moon."

 Moonless have 2 set of attacks, Recto and verso.
 Dash attack to switch beetwen them.
skill.wom.lunar_eclipse.tooltip:
"Cease light, cease life... Cease hope"

 Strike foes in front of you
 and makes them glow for 7sec.

 In Recto : 
  - Attaking Glowing targets, stack your damage
    and increase their Glowing lvl.
  - Attaking Blind targets, stack your damage
    and remove their Blindness.

 In Verso: 
  - Attaking Glowing targets, stack your damage
    and remove their Glowing.
  - Attaking Blind targets, increase their Blindness lvl

 Recto Jump attack ( Crescent )
  Unleash all stacked damage on the target.
  If it kills the target, it bounce to the closest target
  and loose 5% of its damage.
    Glowing increase the bounce range.
    Blindness increase the damage.

 Verso Jump attack ( Fullmoon )
  Unleash 70% of the stacked damage in Aoe.
    Blindness increase the damage.
item.wom.solar.tooltip: "The power of the sun, in the palm of my hand"
skill.wom.solar_arcano.tooltip:
"Witness the full force of a star"

 After each basic attack, a special icon will apear within a short period.
 Press the Skill button when you see it to perform a timed Solar attack.
 Solar attack cycle between ignites ( Polvora ) and explode ( Chispear ):

    Polvora : set the target in fire. if target is
    allready in fire, increase ignitions level by 1.
    (can only go up to 2)

    Chispear: if target is in fire, extinguish the fire and
    explode for a set of damage depending on the ignitions level.
    (3 => 6 => 9, +1 per sweeping edge lvl)

 Solar have a unique skill meter mechanique.
 Heat level, wich is showed by the percentage number on the skill,
 can change color (from red to white) depending on the Heating speed.
 Increase Heat level by increasing heating speed above
 the orange lvl by successfully performing Chispear.
 The heating speed increase depends on the target ignition level.

 Hold guard and press skill to perform Solar Brasero.
 Solar Brasero harvest heat level to perform incendiary spell:

    Obscuridad: Infuse your blade with soul fire,
    melting it into a new form.
    All attacks within this form trigger Chispear.
    Lock your heating speed to red.

    Crematorio: breath soul fire in front of you.
    Burns targets to ignitions level 3.
    Durations depends on the amount of time
    they stay in the flame.

    Infierno: Burn target around you in a spherical shape.
    The area of effect will keep growing until 10 sec.
    Every 2sec, target within the area are affected by polvora.
    (can increase ignition level to 3)
    During infierno, all the speed at wich heat level is affected is doubled.
item.wom.antitheus.tooltip:
"Harvest life in the most horrible and obnoxious way."

 Attacks have 20% chance to cause wither for 6sec.
 If the entity allready has wither effect, then it
 reapply a stronger wither effect with the duration refreshed.

 Each Sweeping edge lvl, give 10% more chance to cause Wither
 and increase the duration by 2sec.
skill.wom.demonic_ascension.tooltip:
"The scythe takes possession of your body
 and use it to perform terrible things...."

Ascenscion :
 on a large area, try to Apply Wither effect
 before applying 50% catharsis* on affected entity.

In Demon form:
 Base Duration is equal to 20s x (1 + (Sweeping edge level) / 3).
 Dash attack have twice the chance to apply wither effect but
 will consume more and more health if used multiple times.
 Other attacks will cause 80% Catharsis* on withered entitys if they hit.

 *Catharsis: Reap of the wither effect from the target
 dealing the remaining damage depending on the catharsis percentage at once
 and heal you for the remaining of that percentage.
 catharsis also increase the Demon form
 duration depending on their wither state
 (+3s for wither II and +6s for wither III).
item.wom.demon_seal.tooltip: An old demon is sealed inside this.
item.wom.eternal_fire_arcane.tooltip:
In this book, is writen the arcane for endless blaze fire.
Title says:"Encarnacion solar infinita".
skill.wom.charybdis.tooltip: Consume Stamina to perform a whirlwind of hit for a total of 8 strikes. Reduce the stamina consumption with sweeping edge.
skill.wom.ender_step.tooltip: A fast teleportion away from the danger. While executing this skill, player become immune from physical attacks.
skill.wom.ender_obscuris.tooltip:
Teleport you behind the last hitted target within 30 blocks (in radius from your position).

While executing this skill, player become immune from physical attacks.
skill.wom.shadow_step.tooltip:
§oSink in the shadows.§r
Moving in the shadow will twist space to make you move faster than the light itself.

While executing this skill, player become immune from physical attacks.
skill.wom.bull_charge.tooltip:
Charge forward pushing away any entity that come across your path.

You are immune to stun effect during the charge and take 40% less damage
skill.wom.precise_roll.tooltip:
Faster, further and cheaper roll.

 Perform acrobatic Roll like a true expert.
skill.wom.dodge_master.tooltip:
Instinctly dodge a small distance if you would take damage after the cast within a window of 0.30s. Continuesly dodge all attack after the first one within a window of 0.50s and after each succesful dodge.

Double stamina consumption on multiple cast.
skill.wom.time_travel.tooltip:
Register your position and health on cast.
After 5sec you'll be teleported back to your previus position and half of all damage taken within this time is healed.

Cast again to teleport early or sneak to cancel.
skill.wom.punishment_kick.tooltip: Kick in front of you with force. Cause strong Stun and can blackout if perform during enemy attack.
skill.wom.counter_attack.tooltip:
Perfect Guard will trigger a counter attack based on weapons attacks.

Available Weapon Types : %s
skill.wom.perfect_bulwark.tooltip:
Holding Guard stance will block attacks from all directions at low progressive stamina cost.
Releasing guard after being hit 5 times will send a shockwave that pushes enemys away. 

Available Weapon Types : %s
skill.wom.vengeful_parry.tooltip:
Put you in a guarding stance for 2sec.
You will hold your position during that time blocking all attack at no stamina cost.
After that you'll be able to send back all the damage in your next attack.
Refresh damage on recast.
1sec cooldown.

Available Weapon Types : %s
skill.wom.soul_protection.tooltip:
Loose the ability to guard.

 Each second you summon a soul that give 1% damage negation.
Your own soul give you 20% damage negation.

 Getting damaged will remove 3 souls.
skill.wom.shulker_cloak.tooltip:
Loose the ability to guard.

 Every 5 sec, You gain one level of shulker resistance. 

If you have at least 1 level of Shulker resistance, you will negate 60% of damage.

Getting damaged reduce the level by 1.
skill.wom.arrow_tenacity.tooltip: Prevent the stun from arrows damage. This skill is permanent, thus you can use another passive on top of it but, you'll only keep the current passive if you die.
skill.wom.pain_anticipation.tooltip: If no action is performed within 2 sec, gain "Anticipation" this will grant you stun immunity and reduce the damage taken by 40% for the next action during 2.0s.
skill.wom.latent_retribution.tooltip: If no action is performed within 4 sec, gain "Retribution" this will grant you stun immunity and boost your damage by 40% during that time for the next action during 4.0s.
skill.wom.vampirize.tooltip: Heal you for 10% of the damage you deal.
skill.wom.critical_knowledge.tooltip:
Give you %s%% chance to deal %s%% more damage.
Critical chance is increased by 5%% for each level of Fire Protection enchantement you have. Critical damage is increased by 15%% per Blast Protection enchantement you have
skill.wom.heart_shield.tooltip:
Give you 20 shield point that will recover if no action is performed for %ssec at the rate of 1 point every %ssec.

Shield recovery rate can be improved with Protection enchantment.
skill.wom.mindset.tooltip:
While above 80% Health,
gain mindest which will increase your damage by 30% and decrease the damage recieved by 20%
skill.wom.adrenaline.tooltip:
While under 20% Health,
gain adrenaline wich will increase your damage by 60% and decrease the damage recieved by 40%
skill.wom.dancing_blade.tooltip:
"Dance on the sound of death"

Gain 80% damage on every 4th successfull attack.
skill.wom.meditation.tooltip:
Sneak for 2 second without moving to enter in state of meditation. the longer you meditate the longer the buff.
There is 3 stage of meditation each giving different effect:

 Stage 1: 40% damage dealing.

 Stage 2: 30% attack speed and Movement speed I

 Stage 3: 50% damage reduction and Regeneration I
skill.wom.spider_techniques.tooltip:
Allow you to run on walls.

 Hold sprint and jump toward a wall to run on it.
 Release sprint to fall or release movement input to slide slowly.
 Sneak to reduce the slide fall even more.

 You can jump from a wall to another by adjusting horizontal view angle.
 The position you jump from will adjust the hight of the wall jump.
skill.wom.aqua_maneuvre.tooltip:
Improve swiming ability.

 Swim faster under water or a little less faster above water.

 Release jump button to propel under water or butterfly swim above water.
skill.wom.bi_phased.tooltip:
After doging succesfully 5 attack,
you'll get into ectoplasmic phase for 20sec.

 Ectoplasmic phase: Attacks phase through you.
skill.wom.voodoo_magic.tooltip:
Loosing Health increase Stamina by half,
Loosing Stamina increase Health by half.

Sneak to transfer health into stamina at double rate.

Disable stamina auto recovery.
skill.wom.back_and_forth.tooltip:
Allow you to blackout your target after reaching a certain distance from it.

Attack your target once then move away from it.
Once the distance beetween you and your target is greater than 20,your next dash attack will be a strong stun that blackout your target for 5sec.
death.attack.timed_katana_slashes: %1$s didn't know that ... he was allready dead !
death.attack.perfect_bulkwark_shockwave: %1$s got pushed away to the spirit world !
death.attack.lunar_eclipse: Lunar ecplise arcana was too much for %1$s.
death.attack.timed_katana_slashes.item: %1$s didn't know that ... he was allready dead !
%1$s got pushed away to the spirit world !
death.attack.lunar_eclipse.item: Lunar ecplise arcana was too much for %1$s.
